<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103195</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103195</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212062</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Searching the internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Suchen des Internets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche de l'Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Procurarando o Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca del Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα του Διαδικτύου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Buscar el Internet</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This unit takes learners through the process of understanding the priorities involved in finding information on the Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit nimmt Anfänger durch den 
Prozeß des Verstehens der Prioritäten, die wenn sie Informationen 
über das Internet mit einbezogen werden, findet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité prend à des étudiants par le 
processus de l'arrangement les priorités impliquées en trouvant 
l'information sur l'Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade faz exame de learners com o processo 
de compreender as prioridades envolvidas em encontrar a informação 
no Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità prende i principianti con il 
processo di capire le priorità addette a trovare le informazioni sul 
Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα παίρνει τους αρχαρίους μέσω της 
διαδικασίας τις προτεραιότητες που περιλαμβάνονται στην εύρεση των
πληροφοριών για το διαδίκτυο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad toma a principiantes con el proceso de
entender las prioridades implicadas en encontrar la información sobre
el Internet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ITRAINONLINE MMTK
FN:ITRAINONLINE MMTK
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212062</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103195</entry>
    </identifier>
